title: Domestic vs. Foreign Players in the NBA — Statistical Analysis
description: Python-based data cleaning and analysis of PER, TS%, and defensive metrics.

title: The DataScience System — Personal Website & Portfolio
description: Built from scratch with HTML and CSS, featuring a responsive layout, clean navigation, and a contact form.

title: Amazon Product Rating Predictor
description: Built and evaluated models to predict Amazon product ratings from review text and metadata; includes feature engineering and validation workflows.

title: Persuasive or Deceptive Visualization?
description: Two visuals using the same dataset—one supporting and one challenging the proposition that climate-related disasters are accelerating worldwide—to show how design can persuade in either direction.
